ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] So where to go at 34?
ygData.msgSnippet: oh ya i love the pop thing even if my main is a druid i still love it ps...do not go to faronia vie if your evil and do not go there in wolf form i hate typos
ygData.messageBody:
oh ya
i love the pop thing
even if my main is a druid
i still love it

ps...do not go to faronia vie if your evil
and do not go there in wolf form

i hate typos

nomad
----- Original Message -----
From: Lavender, Sara M
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, December 10, 2002 5:24 AM
Subject: RE: [The EverQuest Tavern] So where to go at 34?


Or if you have PoP then you can just go to the "Overthere" portal thing
and not worry about all that boat riding.



-----Original Message-----
From: nomad [mailto:sasank@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 10, 2002 5:09 AM
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] So where to go at 34?



i went to about 33 on my druid in highkeep too
i suggest you try the overthere and the fronteer mountians in kunark
you will have to take the big ship(the maidens voyage) from butcher
block to faronia vie then run to the lake of ill omen and then to
fronteer mountians then to the overthere
or get a druid or wiz port to the dreadlands and run from there
(the dreadlands is like a 45 to 50+ zone though so do be careful)
you will need to review maps of course

if however you are of an evil race
you can take the bloated belly barge from the oasis of mar to an island
and then walk accross some rocks to a ogre outpost and take a broken
ship to the overthere outpost

if you evil do go to faronia vie
if you are good do not go to the overthere outpost

or
if you like luclin you can still get some exp in marus seru
and you can get groups dawnshroud pieks
a quick run from the nexus through neitherbain lare to ether one

for many races though the wolves are a problem in dawnshroud
my wood elf druid seem to be amiable to most wolves but most other races
are kos to them
(i think they dont mind vah shir much ether)


im almost done with my epic (excited)
we go for the dragon this saturday

i think i have never talked on here much
but i do read it

gratz on 34


nomad

----- Original Message -----
From: ravens_sorrows
To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, December 09, 2002 8:13 PM
Subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] So where to go at 34?


Hello all. It's been a bit of time since I last posted. Sorry for
that. Between school and works (yes that's three jobs in that works)
I have been a very busy person. But I have managed to squeeze in
some precious EQ time, so I am happy. Now my question is this. I am
presently lvl 32. I am a tick and a half away from 33 so in my mind
that's close enough to 34 for me. (LOL Math was never my best
subject as you can tell.) Anyway. I am currently in High Keep
getting my lvl's and as soon as I get 34 I am so out of there. The
only problem is...where? I have considered Sol A, but I don't know
if I want to go there if it is crowded or if it is empty. (What with
all the expansions and all.) So where to go at lvl 34 for an
Enchanter? Any suggestions?

Raven

AKA Leria E'ci Server
AKA Tleya E'ci Server
